text: He da'uda! ‘‘Hamile dharatima timila'i uttaradhikari bana'eka chaum. Atah timile manisaharuko bicama satyatako satha phaisala garnu ra aphno vyaktigata icchako anupalana nagarnu ki tyasale timila'i allahako margabata vicalita gara'idinecha, juna manisaharu allahako margabata vicalita hunchan, niscaya nai uniharuko nimti kathora yatana cha, kinabhane uniharule hisabako dinala'i birsidi'e
